content:
The flight duration from New York to Tokyo can vary depending on several factors, including the departure and arrival airports, the airline, and the route taken. Here are some approximate flight durations from New York to Tokyo:

**Non-stop flights:**

* New York (JFK) to Tokyo (NRT) on ANA or Japan Airlines: around 11 hours and 30 minutes to 12 hours and 30 minutes
* New York (JFK) to Tokyo (HND) on ANA or Japan Airlines: around 11 hours and 15 minutes to 12 hours and 15 minutes

**Flights with layovers:**

* Singapore Airlines from New York (JFK) to Tokyo (NRT) with a layover in Singapore (SIN): around 18 hours and 30 minutes to 20 hours and 30 minutes (including layover time)
* Other airlines with layovers in cities like Hong Kong, Seoul, or Beijing: around 19 hours to 24 hours (including layover time)

Please note that these are approximate flight durations, and the actual flight time may vary depending on factors like weather conditions, air traffic, and flight route changes.

It's also worth considering that flights from New York to Tokyo often depart in the evening and arrive in Tokyo in the morning, which can help minimize jet lag. However, it's always a good idea to check the flight schedules and durations when booking your ticket to ensure you're comfortable with the travel time.

If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask!
